donor_name: OFFICE OF THE HIGH COMMISSIONER FOR HUMA
outputs.output_descr: This Agreement will be implemented under the overall guidance of the UN Resident Coordinator in Tajikistan with administrative support from UNDP, substantive support of a Human Rights Advisor (L-4) and Administrative Assistant (GS-4), and with additional substantive human rights support from OHCHR Regional Office in Central Asia and HQ in Geneva as requested and required.

project_descr: Support to UN Coordination. UN Coordination Unit / RC Office.
